src_original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayam adhyātmam utpadyeta sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 阿難！ 若無有眼更樂，各各無眼更樂者，設使離眼更樂，當有緣眼更樂生樂覺、苦覺、不苦不樂覺耶？
若無耳、鼻、舌、身、意更樂，各各無意更樂者。

src_original: ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam adhyātmaṃ utpadyeta veditaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 設使離意更樂，當有緣意更樂生樂覺、苦覺、不苦不樂覺耶？

src_original: sarvaśo vā ānanda sparśe asati (DhskD 9v6)  vedanā prajñāyeta /  no bhadanta /  tasmād dhy ānandaitan nidānaṃ vistareṇa yāvad /
